articles.description: Check out the betting lines for a potential heavyweight title fight between the champion, Francis Ngannou, and the possible challenger, Jon Jones.
articles.content: Francis Ngannou just knocked out Stipe Miocic in their rematch at UFC 260 to win the promotions heavyweight belt. Since long time light heavyweight champion, Jon Jones, has been gearing up for his mo… [+1680 chars]

articles.title: "This was an injustice": Watson slams penalty for Reid's bump on Fyfe - SEN
articles.description: Tim Watson says the MRO and AFL have missed an opportunity to show how seriously they take head knocks.
articles.content:
Tim Watson believes the two match suspension for Giants veteran Sam Reid following his bump on Fremantle captain Nat Fyfe is an injustice.
